prompts.weather_summary:
Create a concise 3-sentence weather summary from this data:
{data}

Use these guidelines:
- Mention notable temperature swings
- Highlight precipitation chances over 30%
- Note any severe weather alerts
- Use friendly, conversational tone
- Keep under 500 characters
- Use metric units
